00038   /*
00039    * Adds a link to the Scenario.
00040    * @param The Link to be added
00041    */
00042   void Scenario::addLink(Link* l){
00043     Intersection* from = l->getFrom();
00044     Intersection* to = l->getTo();
00045     // Setting neighbour set of intersections
00046     if(to != NULL && from != NULL){
00047       from->addNeighbour(to);
00048       to->addNeighbour(from);
00049     }
00050     // Adding links to in and out sets of intersections
00051     if(to != NULL)
00052       to->addInLink(l);
00053 
00054     if(from != NULL)
00055       from->addOutLink(l);
00056     
00057 
00058     links.push_back(l);
00059   }
00060 
00061   /*
00062    * Gets a Intersection of the Scenario.
00063    * @param ID  
00064    */
00065   Intersection* Scenario::getIntersection(string id){
00066     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = intersections.begin(); i != intersections.end(); i++)
00067       if((*i)->getId() == id) return *i;
00068     return NULL;
00069   }

00071   /*
00072    * Gets a Intersection of the Scenario.
00073    * @param Scats ID  
00074    */
00075   Intersection* Scenario::getIntersection(int scatsId){
00076     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = intersections.begin(); i != intersections.end(); i++)
00077       if((*i)->getScatsId() == scatsId) return *i;
00078     return NULL;
00079   }

00081   /*
00082    * Gives the maximum number of detectors among all intersections.
00083    */
00084   int Scenario::getMaxTotalDetectors(){
00085     int max = 0;
00086     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = intersections.begin(); i != intersections.end(); i++){
00087       int n_detectors = (*i)->getTotalDetectors();
00088       if(n_detectors > max) max = n_detectors;
00089     }
00090     return max;
00091   }
00092

00099     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = intersections.begin(); i != intersections.end(); i++){
00100       int n_phases = (*i)->getTotalPhases();

00102     }
00103     return max;
